Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers are on a three-game home winning streak.
Thursday's game is the sixth meeting between the Detroit Tigers and Tampa Bay Rays this season, with the Tigers leading the season series 4-1.
Riley Greene leads the Tigers with a .264 batting average, 26 doubles, six triples, and 24 home runs.
Parker Meadows is 10-for-41 with two home runs and three RBI over the past 10 games.
Christopher Morel has 11 doubles, three triples, and 21 home runs for the Rays.
Jonathan Aranda is 8-for-31 with three home runs over the last 10 games.
